product_overview: TestPrep Pro is an AI-powered test preparation platform designed to transform PDF-based study materials into interactive mock tests. It leverages advanced OCR and AI models to extract multiple choice questions from uploaded PDFs, generate personalized tests, and provide insightful analytics to maximize student learning outcomes.
core_goals: Enable users to upload PDF study materials and automatically extract well-structured multiple choice questions using OCR and AI.
Provide an intuitive interface for users to create, take, and review personalized mock tests based on extracted or manually configured questions.
Deliver detailed analytics, including performance summaries, subject-wise analysis, and progress tracking to help users improve their preparation.
Support adaptive and flexible test creation methods including AI-extracted questions from PDFs and manual test blueprints with subject selection.
Ensure secure user authentication and session management to personalize learning experience and save user data.
Offer a seamless and engaging user experience with responsive design, animations, and an easy-to-navigate dashboard.
key_features: PDF Upload and Processing: Upload PDFs up to 50MB, convert PDF pages to images, apply Google Cloud Vision OCR, and extract questions via Gemini AI module.
AI Question Extraction: Accurate question extraction with subject classification (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology), difficulty estimation, and confidence scoring.
Test Creation Studio: Create tests from AI-extracted questions or manually configure test blueprints with subject selection, difficulty level, and test type.
Test Taking Interface: Comprehensive test interface with question palette, mark-for-review functionality, timer, answer saving, and navigation controls.
Results and Analytics Dashboard: Visualize detailed test results including score summaries, time analysis, attempt statistics, and subject-wise accuracy.
User Authentication: Email/password and Google OAuth sign-in/sign-up flows with session callbacks and password reset.
Subscription Plans and Pricing: Multiple pricing tiers with features like PDF upload limits, AI test generation counts, analytics, video explanations, and support plans.
Interactive Homepage with Feature Highlights, Testimonials, Pricing, FAQ, and Call to Action sections.
Robust API: API endpoint to handle PDF processing, status checking, and that returns clear success/failure messages and processing stats.
Responsive UI Components: Utilizes Tailwind CSS, Radix UI primitives, and lucide-react icons for modern, accessible, and animated UI elements.
user_flow_summary: User visits the home page to discover features, testimonials, and pricing; can sign in or register.
Authenticated user accesses the dashboard with navigation sidebar for tests, uploads, achievements, analytics, and calendar.
User uploads a PDF file via Upload Page; system validates PDF, stores file, initiates processing pipeline.
PDF processing converts pages to images, runs OCR to extract text, AI extracts MCQs with metadata, and stored in DB.
User configures a new test from extracted questions or creates a test blueprint manually, defining parameters.
In Test Taking interface, user navigates questions, selects answers, marks questions for review, and completes test.
Upon submission, responses are saved, scores calculated, and user redirected to Results page showing detailed analytics.
Users may view their test history, achievements, and personalized insights from the dashboard.
API endpoints enable PDF processing and status checking, supporting front-end operations with real-time feedback.
validation_criteria: PDF Upload feature accepts only PDF files <= 50MB; rejects others with clear error messaging.
OCR and AI extraction pipeline reliably extracts valid multiple choice questions with at least 99% accuracy rate as claimed.
User registration, login, and password reset flows function correctly with proper validations and error handling.
Tests created from PDFs correctly link extracted questions with accurate counts and metadata in DB.
Test taking UI correctly reflects question status, supports answer selection, marking for review, and timer controls.
Test submission calculates scores properly and updates attempt records; results page displays correct analysis.
Dashboard navigation loads pages without errors; all API calls handle failures gracefully with feedback to user.
Pricing plans are displayed clearly with respective features and CTA buttons behave as expected.
Performance analytics update dynamically based on user test data with meaningful insights and visualizations.
All UI components maintain responsiveness and accessibility standards across devices and browsers.
